name: Skull's Solitude
description:
Skull's Soliditude is a short indie casual action RPG budget title with a dark fantasy/cyberpunk setting. Awaken in an underground lab, the lone protagonist fights his way to the surface and explore the dystopian city of Perle.

  • play as an greatsword-wielding undead in a bulky power suit
  • robots, flying cars and demons
  • familiar, easy-to-pick-up action RPG mechanics
  • high difficulty if player wants to avoid dying; casual difficulty otherwise
